HOME.ROLE: Junior FullStack Developer with Python experience
HOME.DESCRIPTION_1: I have knowledge of Python and JavaScript for backend development, as well as Angular and Node.js for frontend. I work with relational databases like MySQL and non-relational ones like MongoDB and Firebase. I have experience deploying applications using Railway, Vercel, and Render.
HOME.DESCRIPTION_2: Additionally, I have experience using Docker, Git, and GitHub, and I work with cloud caching systems like Redis.
